text: Aur gupta, paani bharne chal raha?
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Yo Mishraji! Khush rahiye aur khushiya failaiye, aur jaise assignments mein madad karte the waise aage bhi kardijiyega kabhi. Zindagi ke liye best of luck.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Hey Sonty, I know you don't like that nickname but can you really blame me when sonthalia is so fkin long. (Calling you aditya is out of the question ofc, if someone asked me do you know aditya I would probably say no). Ofcourse you enjoyed sharing a single bed with me you practically hijacked my bed and wouldn't budge!

 We've known each other for quite some time but we really grew close over the last 2 years. I would say lockdown might have been a blessing in disguise and helped us focus on what we really want. The udaipur trip was perfectly timed and I have so many amazing memories from it. Tbh, I know you don't regret doing cringe stuff in public, thats what makes it so thrilling and fun :) . Definitely glad to have you as one of my closest friends currently. 

Baaki to mein college khatam karke jaldi aa hi raha hoon ;P
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo man, its been fun knowing you, with your weird stuff and amazing art, and everything in between. The 4am nightouts playing and discussing things in each other's rooms, things I won't forget. Also that night we partied like the world was ending, when it rained, and we found hemant passed out on the cold floor, was one of the best nights I've had in a really really long time. 

Keep in touch bro.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo man,
I wish we had met earlier. Its fun to have convos with you, especially the stuff we did in soc with Munmun jha. Also had some quality discussions in the last days, the one with you me hemant and dev xD. Would've been more fun if you'd stayed another year, but you got an even better place to be. Godspeed to you!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Are anany bhai, kaise hai aap? Jaise campus mein beech beech mein dikhte rehta hai waise hi life mein beech beech mein dikhte rehna :P
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Everyone's already told you how kind hearted or a nice person you are, so I obviously don't need to tell you more. You're someone whose company I can enjoy effortlessly, without trying to change to fit the situation even a little bit. That's really rare for me. I've always looked back at our time fondly, hope you do the same. Thanks for laughing at my silly jokes xD, hopefully we can meet again in life.

What did the cat teacher say to the student slacking off?
.
Do your homework, Meow!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
I might be famous for sleeping through important shit like exams or registeration, but you mfer take the crown when it comes to sleeping at the most daring places. You're a chill guy, extremely fun to converse with simply because it makes me think before I actually speak in the conversation. The qualities (read: shit) I like about you is your no nonsense attitude, approaching things without preconceptions or biases, and not giving a F about peer pressure or tradition. And not necessarily in the academic sense. 

Will always remember those night walks trying to think of a cool name for the antaragni that never happened xD
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: "Anish tum har fest mein dikhte rehte the, kitna acha lagta tha, phir tum OS ki class mein aagaye" Do you remember this from 2nd year antaragni? Thats how I would say our acquaintanceship evolved. From being fest buddies to then being actual friends. Thanks for that amazing mutton biryani on the last nights in IITK. You're a cool guy, lets meet up if we're ever in the same city.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Heyo, the next time you say you're gonna open the door when I knock, and it's just gonna be "5 mins", I ain't believing none of that shit. Wish I'd known you sooner. Very chill and fun personality to be around.

See ya around.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
YOOO BHAI!!! 11th mein to apan ne zyaada interact nahi kiya tha, but 12th mein to roz saath mein hi baith te the. Special shoutout to Akshat and Rohit bhaiya. Hope wo bhi mast hai. First year mein tum to kabhi milne aate nahi the to mein hi aagaya tumhare yahaan and phir hamne epic scenery drawing banayi ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Phir 2nd year summer tere aur satyam ke saath kaafi masti kiye aur tumne meri kaafi help ki. Apni bakchodiya to chalti rahegi, wo placement prep waala group yaad hai? ðŸ˜‚. 

Tu over the years kaafi grow kiya hai kota waale archit se, lekin abhi bhi dil se pure hai. Kaafi mast dost hai tu. Take care bhai
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Hey dost, hamari cycle race part 2 reh gayi :( .
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: To be honest, that Alice stuff was just a bunch of horseshit. Take care bro :)
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Met you in first year sometime, and then we had those galaxy els practices. Definitely my highlight of the 2nd semester. Honestly doing els in galaxy was a steal, we didnt have to work remotely as hard as the dance guys and boy did I love playing games while being applauded by the HEC. Do you remember our amazing stock the stock run? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Trading is all about luck I suppose, so its better to buy and sleep xD. You're a fun and cool guy..lets keep in touch!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Where do I start? You've been one of my rare constants throughout the 4 years of college. It's actually amazing that we managed to find each other (thanks Pragya!) in first semester itself. Also I think we literally had a common class every semester (even summer :P) despite being in different departments. And it was the same shit every sem, me texting you to ask class mein kya hua and you saying 'kabhi to prof ko shakal dikha de'. 

Theres too many memories to recall all of them, the texts (albeit less than they should be), or the random ccd hangouts, or the random bakchodi. You've definitely managed to be there as well in some of my sadder moments, and thanks alottt for that. About that reel, ahem, the cringe is worth it if it is memorable :P . We'll for sure meet in the future and make that reel, and spend more quality time. Going for Upmanyu just before corona was the best decision ever. Don't forget me now that you're going away,

Will miss you alot,
Love, Shreyash
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Shoutout to jaya singhvi and drunk priyal antics!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Hey Ashwin, you're one of the nicer guys on campus, really calm, really composed, and really cool. Had fun talking to you randomly in ccd. Hope we meet again sometime :).
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo avani, thanks for the fun times in campus over the years. Will never forget the time you and inshu hijacked my phone in micasa and when I got it back it had over a 100 pictures taken in 5 mins. 

And the udaipur trip was so memorable! and a big part of it was you, so thanks for being there. Hope we can do another trip sometime if possible, and otherwise mil to lenge hi kahi. Best of luck in life :)
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: If you've forgotten my birthday, we aren't friends anymore.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Here's the real memoir :P

Meeting you, pragya, shyamal and all by going to the anime screening was an incredible coincidence. We used to talk a lot in 1st and 2nd year, and you've always been that chill girl thats down for cool stuff and takes life one step at a time. I think we've had much less outings even though we've been decently close, maybe we could change that in the future if we meet :P . Ofcourse, the birthday memories will always be there. Take care, Gaur xP
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Hey mate! The first time we interacted you wished me happy birthday and I replied something very off handed xD (In my defense I didn't exactly know you then). Since then we've had amazing walks, talks and spent some of the most quality time in hall 5 that I can think of. I always had a wing to go after random visits to the canteen, knowing I would spend some good time there. Its sad that corona took a year of that from us, and I got a bit disconnected from ya all during that time, waiting for the stuff to end. You in the meantime took the opportunity and nailed everything. Lets talk more boi and lets meetup sometime.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Ayush, I had a few but pleasant interactions with you, in labs or in classes. You are a nice person, hope we get to meet again in life, and till then, the best of luck!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Yo Ayush, had a fun time frauding samsung and interning with you in the same team :) . You're a good guy, take care and best of luck.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Hey mate, thanks for the conversations we've had over the years, and the football we played in kota (if you still remember). Best of luck for the future
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo bhadwe, wanted to drop a hi :P. 

Samsung mein to bakchodi ki kaafi tune, dikhte rehna aage, duniya kaafi choti hai, kabhi na kabhi to aayenge ek hi jagah.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: We met very recently, but you seem a very jovial dude and really fun to hangout with. Maybe it was a product of the times, but despite the fact that we've spent so little time together, we've already done some of the "big" things in friendship, like drinking together, nightouts, some crazy parkour over walls, and running from the sis guards. Damn, just talking about this makes me nostalgic. Hope to see more of you in the next year :).
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: We've had alot of interactions through ALOT of mutuals over the years. Be it faizan, or ananya, or you showing up in my wing at totally random times. A little bit of drinking too much never hurt anybody. I swear to god the GH floor turned to water, thats why I was swimming xP.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Faizii Boi, how've you been? You're a great person man, I'm glad to have known you. You always take up more than you can handle, but you don't complain, its one of the best things about you. I get the feeling that there's always been some extra load on you, and you've worked your way through college managing all of that. We've had our fair share of amazing times, and you're probably also on the list of people I feel I should've spent more time with.

Also, the food at your home was *chef's kiss*, Mashallah.

Khuda Hafiz
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: I hope we never meet on my birthday ever again. You participated in my GPL when you didn't even know me in first year. Always enjoyed our random encounters, and your texts are always dank and funny (you know the ones I'm talking about :P) . You're on the list of people I wish I had a big night out with, but its been fun nonetheless.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo chacha! 

From you breaking your leg by falling in a ditch, then giving me your crutches because I thought I broke my leg, we've had some fun times. Especially your acting skills are gold lmao!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
You can be stubborn at times, really really stubborn, but maybe thats one of the best things about you. You really stick to your guns, although that does gets you in trouble sometimes. Although my memories and time with you have mostly been fond, and Ayush and Akshay. I was the 4th leg to your trio, but I can't say we spent some quality time in each others rooms. Let's get this year over with and take the world by storm (you know which storm I'm talking about xP).

Ps. Fuck Moash.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Yo Jay, apan ne college mein utna zyaada interact nahi kiya even though ham pehle se ache se jaante the and literally upar niche rehte the xD. But phir bhi im happy that I've known you itne saal. Tu to kaafi chaapu ban gaya iss time mein, hamesha kuch na kuch mein busy rehta tha aur kuch karta rehta tha. Chal, zyaada nahi likh ra iss umeed mein ki ye apna aakhri alvida nahi hoga, and future mein bhi ham milenge.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo deepak dost, sabse pehle to thanks 251 mein carry karne ke liye. Mein pura noob jisko kuch samajh nahi aa raha tha 4th sem mein about linux, kd lab computers ko dekh ke headaches hote the, aur doosre "distractions" mein busy rehta tha, tumne kabhi complaint nahi ki, phir bhi meine drop kardiya. 

Unlike me, tune bohot bohot growth kiya hai pichle 5 saalo mein. Kota mein thode nervous se lagte the, but ab to tumse confident launda nahi dikhta campus mein. Maths mein jab random doubts puchte the kabhi kabhi to bohot maza aata tha xD. Aur tumhara, harish, pulkit ne jo hostile takeover kiya hai ham sabki facebook feed ka wo to koi nahi bhulega. Lekin kabhi meine unfollow nahi kiya kyunki kaafi entertainment dete rehte the :) . Tum kaafi sahi bande ho yaar, kaafi reliable and kabhi help karne se mana nahi karte. I know this quality of yours will help you immensely in the future. Take care bro. <3
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Yo, you're a fun person to hangout with. Have alot of fun memories from 1st year, from meeting up on anime night (in hindsight one of my best decisions to go to that event in 1st year lol) to antaragni. Still remember we had a really nice walk on one antaragni night. Stay cool, Stay kawaii :P . Also give me more anime recs, I'm not even close to the level you're at xD
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
You've been hands down the most "like minded" and interesting person to have a conversation with in campus. We have literally had walks lasting from lunch till dinner, hours after hours, and consistently every single semester. The fact that our tradition never died out, and neither of us got disinterested is in itself amazing. I still remember when we were discussing "is a rock sentient?" 2 hours before DSA endsems xD.  Discussing all kinds of philosophies, agreeing on things and theories that would make a normal person go insane, the darkest of shits, we've done it all. 

And the CBG nights, oh damn. HOW THE FUCK DOES AN 8 MIGHT LOSE TO A 3 MIGHT??? That too 2 matches in a row! All the assignments we did together with batra raghav srajit and cc, and the timepasses, Hall V was a very fun place with you. Hopefully many more meetups in the future.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo Prateek,

Apni baat nahi hui zyaada but tu apni wing ka kaafi dedicated aur simple insaan hai. Kaafi acha karega zindagi mein. Aisa hi reh, aur khush raha kar. Alvida jab tak phir kahi milte nahi hai
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo pratham ji, kaise hai aap? sorry for ditching you in german, but tu dekh hi raha tha mein class mein sota rehta tha sirf. And lets not talk about "focusing on other stuff" xD. Ek saal to abhi baaki hai full masti karenge bas campus bula le phirse yaar. Really wish you were there in the last month of 4th year. 
Baaki baat to hoti rahegi
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Oh Pratigya, you've been one of my longest (in both senses of the word) friends in college. Remember the times I used to sit with you and priyal in PHI141 with prashant baghad (and sleep in class)? That was 4 years ago. I know, so long! There's so many of your antics that I'll remember, like your "DISQUALIFIED!!!" and getting lost on the way from OAT to GH ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. And who can forget your movies in dumbc? Remember tattiya bichu? Yeah, I had to act and make priyal guess that shit. You've taught me many games that are short and fun at parties like password and I'll be grateful for those, but apart from the games, I'm really grateful I knew you and we could spend some parts of our lives knowing each other. 

There's too many memories with you to list all of them here, the amazing dinners, the birthdays at OATs, the parties and so on. But ofcourse I saved the best memory for the last, so here's a first person POV of it.

Me: Priyal, where's Pratigya?! 12 bajne waale hai! Acha, usko room pe laa rahe ho? Ham aa rahe hai.
Me & saqib start cycling towards GH. Raaste mein we find faizan walking with the cake.
Me (in bakchodi) : Are faizan cake mujhe dede mein cycle karke pahucha dunga. 
Faizan: Sure bro? pakka na? *hands over the cake*
Me: Cycling peacefully towards gh, cake in 1 hand. Suddenly priyal ka call aata hai. Me in even more bakchodi, picks up the call with the other hand. Now I've got a cake in one hand, phone in the other, and I'm still cycling. Well, it actually worked perfectly. But, I forgot that I had to stop, aaaaand I couldnt use to brakes.....and so I fell, and the cake fell with me. :( It was a custom cake too!

Oooh, also, Pratigya, how's the time?
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Tumko hamesha naam se jaante the, and hi hello hote rehta tha, but kabhi ache se baat nahi hui. Ye campus ke aakhri mahine almost roz hi dikh jaate the, and ache se jaan bhi gaye tumhe. If I'd recommend a chill af guy who can have fun with almost anyone, tumhara hi naam lenge. Umeed hai ki jald campus aake ek saal aur saath beeta sake.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
YOOO RAHUL. Kaisa hai tu. I think apne college se zyaada kota hostels ki memories hai. The funniest story you've told me was "Mein kindergarten mein jaata tha, lunchbox kholta tha aur khaane lagta tha". I remember meine tereko bohot bola tha MAINS ke baad ki padhle, lekin tune padh liya hota to shaayad apan same college mein nahi hote, so thanks to your aalas for that ðŸ˜œ.

College mein to tu PUBG aur valo enthusiast ban chuka hai. Tu mereko ab bhi waisa hi lagta hai jaise pehle tha, ghar/room par hi rehta hai mostly aur apne close friends ke saath enjoy kar leta hai. Zyaada zindagi mein tension nahi hai. Waise tension lene ki zarurat kahaan hai jab itna chaapu hai tu. Chal, abhi ke liye bye
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Apan sahi mein zyaada nahi mile, but as you said, jitna mile, usme khoob masti ki. Wo Kushagra ne merese pucha "egyptian mummy banega?" to meine haan boldiya tha phir usne tape lagadi sir pe ðŸ˜‚. Samsung intern mein bhi kaafi masti ki hamne, kuch nai karne ka jo paisa mil raha tha. Milenge jab to aur masti karenge, take care bro
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Tum dost to ho hi, aur wing ke shayad sabse sweetest member bhi. Mein hamesha se apne wing ka aadha juda sadasya raha hu, aadhi parties mein rehta nahi aur baaki mein tum sab mujhe control karte ho xD. Lekin tumne kabhi aisa mehsoos karne nahi diya, aur iske liye mein tumhara shukriya ada karta hoon. 3 saal mein single room nahi liya, aur puri wing ko apna room daan kardiya, tumse zyaada selfless banda nahi hai koi. Bhai ka darja to tumhe dete hi hai ham, umeed hai tumhe bhi mein yaad rahu.

To more bakchodis in the future, and may C top live forever. < 3
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Yo Sagnik

Sorry if we disturbed the hell out of you in first year, occupying your room and causing you a world of chaos. We definitely were insensitive and nor were you ready for the roughness that we showed. But I hope over the years we've come to some sort of understanding. Rest you know that you're the most chaapu guy in the wing, and you gonna be showering in that rich rich samsung korea money boy. Take care and enjoy life, you deserve it!
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Hi my neighbor for the last 2 years (although you never showed up for the last one :P). We never played dota together lol, should've done it atleast once :(
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Yo jagga, I think if hall 5 mein voting hui ki sabse cutest Y17 kon hai hall mein to tu hi jeetega. One amazing thing about you is that your face always seems like on the verge of a smile. You almost never look like you're sad, jo kaafi hi adbhud baat hai in itself. I'll remember our mess conversations, and the inevitable pranks you/hemant/baheti would pull on me, like hiding my keys or my phone xD. You're a great guy and I have no doubt you'll do amazing in life.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
We've definitely been less close in IITK than we were in Kota, although that was really just discussing questions lol. You have always been the more hardworking guy, either before, or now. You know I'm not going to congratulate you for all the insane stuff you've been doing the past few years. 

You're one of the few sets of people that I talked to during the lockdown, and we've had our fair share of intellectual conversation. There's some stuff you think about yourself that really isn't as big of a deal as you make yourself think. Get out of that pit hole you keep putting yourself in, it sucks (notice pun, thanks). 

I don't wanna hit you with the classic "bade hone ke baad hame bhul mat jaiyega" cause you're witness to one of the rudest replies to those that I've given (I hope you remember xD), but hey, lets keep up with each others lives once in a while? That'd be great.

Also mfer, you better show up for those 10 year and 20 year reunions, every single one of them. None of that "im too busy with work" bullshit.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Sorry bhai Soumya
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Are Srajit bhadwe, aiyee aiyee. Sach batau to tu campus mein one of the most unique banda hai, on the surface tu ekdum normal lagta hai like every other average joe but tereko jaanne waale jaanta hai andar se tu kitna different hai. Apan ne to kaafi cheezo mein milke fraud maara hai, ek book nikaal sakte hai "The art of the fraud". 

Jo saath mein masti ki hai wo bhi kaafi yaadgaar rahi hai, CBG ke games, ya power rangers dekhna, ya lighter se aag jalake dragon waali feels lena xD. Tu ek to sabke passwords aur roll number bhi yaad rakhta hai to zyaada bura bol bhi nahi sakte :P
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Are samsung waala part to bhool hi gaya. Samsung ko to kya choona lagaya hai. And wo phir bhi hamare work ke saath khush the. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
The first person I met in IITK outside our wing, and what an overachiever he was. Sitting next to each other in a 3 hour long registeration queue and we started talking. Now, we're here. How quickly the time has passed. You're the guy who managed to be with me on like almost every dinner in a Kanpur restaurant. We've done so much shit together, from trying to climb the Y20 rooftops, to simultaneously hitting the crow in academic area to see if the rumours are real. 

Also the dharamshala road trip. In the words of Barney Stinson, "It was....wait for it....LEGENDARY!". Some of the best 4 days I've had in recent years. The chillness, the casualness, it was all amazing. Also thanks for letting me stay at your home and celebrate holi for the first time in many years.

 Lets try to keep in touch.
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Sorry bhai tandon
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text:
Meine to abhi tak ye digest nahi kiya hai ki tu subah 6 baje uthke roz yoga karta hai. In some ways you're one of the most unique personalities of our batch, really laid back, outgoing, conscious about things like yoga, growing your own plants for fucks sake, and despite all of that, one of the most studious guys in our department. Ofcourse its not easy, but you make it look so easy, that's got to be one of your greatest strengths. I don't need to say you'll achieve great things, I know you will, bas mereko kuch bhej dena kabhi :P 

Thanks for the convos, and cya later
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Kuwade, Kuwade. Kaafi dank sense of humour hai tera. Ham kaafi cheezo mein saath mein involved the, from ELS, to book club to Vox. ELS Galaxy practices in first year were some of the nicest memories. Galaxy itself mein hamne kaafi maze kiye. Pulkit bhadwe ne to chodd diya saath, tu hai na ek aur saal?
author: Shreyash  Ravi

text: Tu hamesha se hi mast banda raha hai, aur apan ki kaafi mast baate hui hai hall mein. Tune mereko kaafi interesting cheezo se introduce karane ki koshish ki, lekin hamesha kuch kaam aajata tha. Missed out on some good times. Zindagi mein beech beech mein dikhte rehna, acha lagega.
author: Shreyash  Ravi
